item.description:
What's in a nickname? Amazing art and socialization, obviously... join us in "Rozzie!!"

Be a part of a series of art-inspired networking events. Discuss aesthetic, craft and talent by crawling with fellow artists and architects as part of larger open artist studio events. After visiting local studios, the party will head somewhere nearby for food or drinks. If you can't make the party, you can visit the Roslindale Open Studios from November 6 - 7, 11-5pm.

Meet outside of The Select Cafe (formerly Emack & Bolio's), 2 Belgrade Ave. at 1:30 pm.

For more information contact Rebecca McWilliams at rmcwilliams[at]smma.com.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet outside of The Select Cafe (formerly Emack & Bolio's), 2 Belgrade Ave. at 1:30 pm.
item.name: Architects and Artists Collaborate: Roslindale Open Studios Crawl
